page.title: 13 My Hobby
page.content: My hobbie is making things like toys and my latest toy is a caterpillar.I made the caterpillar by cutting out circles from material and then sewing round the edge of the circle.When i had done that i carefully pulled the thread so that the circle gathered into a smaller circle,i then fastened off.I made 17 circles like this and then cut out 2 smaller white circles which i sewed together and stuffed for the head.I embroided on all of his face features,made a tassle tail and a pom-pom which i joined to 1 of the 17 circles for a hat.I then joined the tail,body,hat and head together to make my caterpillar.
